website_summaries.verdict: While it won't work for everyone, this gel is worth considering for kids with curly hair, as it does a good job for most at controlling and defining curls without being too heavy.
pros: Formulated to condition and moisturize curly hair without a greasy feel
Features a lightweight texture that smooths frizz and curly or kinky hair
cons: A few users report scalp flaking after use

customer_reviews.title: I'm an adult and I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this setting gel it's kind of sick so you need just a little bit rubbing in the ends of your hair and then twist your hair to make little spiral curls then while it's drying take a paper towel and squeeze some of the moisture out about every 5 minutes and let it air-dry and you have the perfect curls. I'm an adult and I love this for my hair cuz it's been and it's not heavy and doesn't wake my hair down
customer_reviews.author: Ramona G. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product/was received broken and spilled out in envelope
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped in a padded envelope and was damaged. Product leaked all over the inside of the envelope. Very disappointing. However, this product is amazing. It's the only thing I use on my daughter's hair. I get so many compliments when out in public. Definitely recommend the product but I think Amazon should reconsider their shipping container to a box for this if its going to be tossed around. Luckily, not much product was spilled out and I still have the lid from my old container.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice curls
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and seal was on. This product brings out my baby’s curls For the day. Only use when we go out not for everyday . Can get very dry if used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 2 year old son's hair. It is never sticky and has great hold.
customer_reviews.author: Fractils

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps for long curly hair
customer_reviews.text: We love this and order it all the time for our son who has super curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: BraveJusticeKidsCo Customer Support

customer_reviews.title: Curls are great and last all day.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for curls but leaves sticky residue on hair not a natural feel.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my grandchildren hair. It helps keep the curls in and gives her hair lots of bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I honestly can't tell a real difference from when I use this or the dollar tree brand but I like that this is formulated for mixed texture hair
customer_reviews.text: We have natural spiral type hair anbd while it assists with my son's curl pattern, I honestly can't tell a real difference from when I use this or the dollar tree brand but I like that this is formulated for mixed texture hair, so we'll keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gel to hold down the edges of my toddlers hair. This one is not it, her hair curls up just the same
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: No Hold
customer_reviews.text: This product provided no hold for my children. Live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Merci

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and does not get flaky. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Use for my sons hair and it doesn’t leave a crunchy feel. Soft and light. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Raschad revels

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works for my 3yr old. Her curls look fire!👌
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product but I do advise using the curly kids curly conditioning cream with this it just makes it look amazing this jell right here is not a hard on on kids his hair I think it does really good it really brings my sons spiral curls out which looks really good I think it conditions the hair it doesn’t make it hard or tough and it just looks like natural beautiful curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Love

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: My 7 years old, mix-hair son enjoys staying his own hair with this product. It's easy to style, not super slimy or sticky, and the hold last my son the entire day without his hair being hard or flaky. Overall, this momma is happy
customer_reviews.author: Siau trio

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kids hair
customer_reviews.text: It smells great and work great on my 2 year old granddaughters hair. She likes that her hair doesn’t get pulled as much as with out this
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Bought for my great granddaughter. Didn't lay her edges down
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sheila D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A fan of this product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped maintain my daughter frizz!! A fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: CaL007

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Light, gives max shine and has decent hold. I do use a stronger hold gel in addition to this bus I love the way this get brings out my waves.
customer_reviews.author: jamye graham

customer_reviews.title: Takes the Place of Two Products
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for my daughter’s mixed hair - moisturizes and keeps it in place at the same time! So glad I found it on Amazon because my usual stores don’t carry it. Their loss!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Baselt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wis this could be put on a subscription because with twin girls I run empty every two weeks
customer_reviews.author: renee

product_meta.title: Curly Kids Curly Gel Moisturizer, 6 oz
product_meta.description: Excellent daily use, CurlyKids Mixed Texture HairCare Curly Gel Curl Moisturizer adds vital moisture and shine. Great for ponytails, bobs and braids, it lightly holds style without feeling stiff or sticky. It also minimizes breakage and damage due to the dryness. Ingredients - Water, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Peg-75 Lanolin, Polysorbate 20, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tetrasodium Edta, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis leaf extract, Hydrolyzed wheat gluten, Hydrolyzed wheat protein, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.
feature_bullets: Maximum moisture and manageability without the sticky, tacky, greasy feel
